item.description:
<strong>Peddling The Internet</strong>
CBS News has a piece, Peddling The Internet, about "custom-built computers with bicycle-powered generators" in Laos:They connect to the Internet

Peddling The Internet

CBS News has a piece, Peddling The Internet, about “custom-built computers with bicycle-powered generators” in Laos:They connect to the Internet
